content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

It's great that you're taking the time to research and find the perfect citrine necklace for your friend's birthday. Remember to stay focused on your budget and prioritize the quality of the citrine stone, setting, and chain.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance. Online marketplaces like Amazon, Etsy, and eBay can be a great resource, and local jewelry stores can offer a more personalized shopping experience.

When you do find the perfect necklace, I'm sure your friend will appreciate the thought and effort you put into selecting a beautiful and meaningful gift.

Good luck with your search, and I hope you find the perfect citrine necklace for your friend's special day!
